# another test

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(streamgraph)

df_parties <- read_excel("~/Dropbox/_doc/_archive/other/_KH/1_data/1_key_data/all_elec_from_database.xlsx")
df_parties <- df_parties %>% filter(Position==1)
df_parties_tally <- df_parties %>% group_by(ElecYear, PartyCode) %>% tally
df_parties_tally <- df_parties_tally %>% filter(ElecYear %in% c(1992, 1997, 2002, 2007, 2013))
df_parties_tally



streamgraph(df_parties_tally, key="PartyCode", value="n", date="ElecYear")


ggplot(df_parties_tally, aes(x=ElecYear, y=n, fill=PartyCode, order=desc(n))) +geom_area()


```
